Olu Ajayi bụ onye Naijirịa na-ese ihe, Onye na-ese foto na onye nyocha nka nke a mụrụ na 1963
Ọ bụ onye isi oche gara aga nke Society of Nigerian Artists, Lagos chapter ma bụrụ onye guzobere Guild of Professional Fine Artists E gosipụtara ya na Who's who in Nigeria online biography.

A mụrụ Olu na Ọgọọst 18, 1963 ma bụrụ onye Ososo, na Akoko Edo LGA nke Edo Steeti. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Auchi Polytechnic na 1984 na HND na Fine Arts. Olu Ajayi gosipụtara Xanti site n'aka Neville Ukoli, na Aboki Comic Strip nke Defunct The Sunday Observer Newspapers
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ese ihe osise n'ime ụlọ nke Defunct The Nigerian Observer Newspapers

Olu Ajayi bụ otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ mbụ nke eserese agba mmiri na Naịjirịa. Mgbe ọ ghọchara onye otu Society of Nigerian Artists (SNA), ọ biliri wee bụrụ Onye isi oche nke Lagos Chapter n'etiti 2008 - 2014 wee guzobe ihe omume October Rain na Art Café nke na-egosi mmemme SNA kwa afọ. Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere Guild of Professional Fine Artists na ọrụ ya maka ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere ụlọ akụ azụmahịa, ụka, ụlọ ngosi na ụlọ ọrụ na-acha anụnụ anụnụ.

E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Nigeria, Africa na Europe ma jee ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ n'ofe mpaghara na mba ụwa. Ọ nyochala "A Promise of Harvest" nke Funnso Ogunlade, "A New Pride" nke Humphrey Bekaren, "Painting a New Order" nke Abraham Ogbodo, "A Blaze of Colour" nke Chinwe Uwatse na "Eccentric Paintings" nke Sunday Times Newspapers, Lagos.
Market by the Palace (1999) mmanụ na eserese bụ ọrụ ya kachasị elu nke e rere na Arthouse Contemporary Limited na 2008.
